name: Galaxiga Arcade Shooting Game
summary: Galaxiga: Classic Arcade Space Shooter is an arcade space shooting 80s game that makes you feel like you are playing a Galaga classic game on mobile. If you are a big fan of arcade retro shooter games like Galaxia, Galaxian, Galaga & Galactica with new modern shooting way and want to give freedom to galactic games, then Galaxiga: Classic Arcade Space Shooter is the perfect game for you.
